comments:
I seem to get these fairly regularly on submit attempts now.  Just saw it when trying
to submit a bug with no description.

-- Error Log --
Date: Tue Dec 05 22:04:07 PST 2006
Message:
Failed to submit to repository: Changes may not have successfully committed.Posting to
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs failed: Invalid Username or Password
Severity: Error
Plugin
ID: org.eclipse.mylar.core
Stack Trace:
javax.security.auth.login.LoginException: Invalid
Username or Password
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.BugzillaClient.parseHtmlError(BugzillaClient.java:979)
at
org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.BugzillaClient.postTaskData(BugzillaClient.java:757)
at
org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.BugzillaTaskDataHandler.postTaskData(BugzillaTaskDataHandler.java:145)
at
org.eclipse.mylar.internal.tasks.ui.editors.AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor$31.run(AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor.java:2487)
at
org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
This is likely due to a change of ip address. Work around for now is to validate the repository in Task Repository view.  Will investigate now....
